Title: Excavation: Gaze of Neltharion
Description:
A Niffen colleague of mine gave me the underground info about an underground tower. It's decrepit and smack-dab in the middle of Zaralek between Loamm, the Djaradin, and that ghastly lab of Neltharion's.

Grab your favorite shovel and meet me there!
ObjectivesText: Meet Roska Rocktooth at the Gaze of Neltharion in Zaralek Cavern.
